actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to make eligible for annuities payable under section 4 of Public Law 92-425 (relating to the Armed Forces Survivor Benefit Plan) persons who became widows during the eighteen-month period following the effective date of such law.

summary.text: Amends the Armed Forces Survivor Benefit Plan to extend eligibility for annuities under such plan to persons widowed 18 months, rather than one year, after the effective date of a specified Act, approved September 21, 1972.

titles.title: A bill to make eligible for annuities payable under section 4 of Public Law 92-425 (relating to the Armed Forces Survivor Benefit Plan) persons who became widows during the eighteen-month period following the effective date of such law.
